code: import{transformUser}from'../transformers';export const getUser=async loginToFind=>{try{return fetch(`http://localhost:3005/users?login=${loginToFind}`).then(loadedUser=>loadedUser.json()).then(_ref=>{let[loadedUser]=_ref;return loadedUser&&transformUser(loadedUser);});}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching user:',error);return null;}};
